title: Ops Research Program Manager
summary: Develop data-based systems and operations research based tools to advance decision making process and digital transformation at NPI capacity team
description: 20% of time will be dedicated to project management with other technical teams for collaboration Migrate data which has historically been maintained in spreadsheets and emails to a data warehouse Set up data pipelines for ongoing data collection and organization Provide cloud-based dashboards for easy access to factory related data through all levels of the organization Develop optimization models to solve manufacturing capacity related problems including sourcing, material allocation, line planning etc
key_qualifications: Scripting — Python, Data Warehousing — Snowflake, Data Visualization — Tableau, Optimization, Mixed Integer Programming — Gurobi, Web Applications — iPywidgets, Voila, Minimum 3-5 years of industry experience
education_experience: Bachelor's degree in Business Operations, Industrial Engineering, Operations Research or related field. Post-grad degree in engineering or economics preferred.
